thread.section_title: The French Quarters Guest Apartments - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Friendly, helpful staff
thread.title_full: Friendly, helpful staff - Review of The French Quarters Guest Apartments, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: John D
title: Friendly, helpful staff
text: We had a two bedroom apartment for a week. From the moment we arrived we were made feel welcome by friendly and helpful staff. The layout was conducive to a very comfortable stay. And the location is the best of the four times I've stayed in New York. Real value for money.
